Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Some assesement is closely related to the teaching material so the GenAI will not be able to know my material as much as my teacher

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Feedback from AI will not make me feel bad because I will not have to interact with the AI (AI have no heart) compared to my teacher

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: AI feedback is not as specific as feedback from teacher. But sometimes feedback fro AI is as overall and can pin point to every wrong but not feedback from teacher
